scripts.build: npm run build-count && npm run build-most-viewed && npm run build-sum && npm run build-segmentation
scripts.build-count: mkdir -p dist/js && browserify assets/count/index.js --standalone Count | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/js/count.js
scripts.build-most-viewed: mkdir -p dist/js && browserify assets/most-viewed/index.js --standalone MostViewed | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/js/most-viewed.js
scripts.build-sum: mkdir -p dist/js && browserify assets/sum/index.js --standalone Sum | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/js/sum.js
scripts.build-segmentation: npm run build-segmentation-js && npm run build-segmentation-css
scripts.build-segmentation-js: mkdir -p dist/js && browserify assets/segmentation/index.js --standalone Segmentation | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > dist/js/segmentation.js
